gov.va.med.lom.foundation.validate

Interface Validator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhoneNumberValidator, SinglePropertyValidator, SsnValidator, ZipCodeValidator

    public interface Validator
    Generic validator interface to be implemented by any class providing validation functionality. This interface defines the validate method, which accepts a value to validate along with information to be used in creating validation error(s).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Messages validate(java.lang.Object value, java.lang.String[] properties, java.lang.Object[] inserts)
      Validate a value, producing the appropriate error(s) if the value is invalid.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        Messages validate(java.lang.Object value,
                java.lang.String[] properties,
                java.lang.Object[] inserts)
        Validate a value, producing the appropriate error(s) if the value is invalid. It is up to subclasses to specify the content and ordering of the property and insert arrays.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to be validated
        properties - List of properties to be used in creating errors
        inserts - List of inserts to be used in creating errors
        Returns:
        A (non-null) messages object
